publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1078 Cathy Jamieson: Masonhill Crematoriumâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Masonhill Crematorium in South Ayrshire, which has been awarded the title of "UK Crematorium of the Year 2007" and recognises the contribution made by the staff of South Ayrshire Council in sensitively delivering a very high standard of service to members of the public.
S3M-1078 Masonhill Crematorium (lodged on 20 December 2007) John Scott*
